sentence.Network_en: Its starting - point is self - dispraise, and its great enemy is conceit.
sentence.Network_cn: 其出发点是自贬, 其大敌是自负.

sentence.Network_en: Neither praise nor dispraise yourself; your actions serve the turn.
sentence.Network_cn: 无须自赞,无须自贬, 你的行为帮你赞,你的行为帮你贬.
